TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

Docs.summary: Used within the template of a to specify the location in the control's visual tree where the column headers are to be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class generates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeader> instances that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> visual tree.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Windows.Media.Geometry GetLayoutClip (System.Windows.Size layoutSlotSize);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Media.Geometry GetLayoutClip(valuetype System.Windows.Size layoutSlotSize) cil managed

Docs.param: The rendered size of the column header.
Docs.summary: Returns a geometry for a clipping mask. The mask applies if the layout system attempts to arrange an element that is larger than the available display space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method override always returns a clipping geometry that is the same size as the column header, regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method override includes the column header drag indicator as a visual child.
